SEARCH
Package Domain

Class DomainController

java.lang.Object
Domain.DomainController
public class DomainController extends Object
The DomainController class acts as a controller for the domain layer, managing interactions between input handling, keyboard operations, and other domain-related functionalities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    DomainController()
    Default constructor for the DomainController class.

  • Constructor Details

    • DomainController

      public DomainController() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Default constructor for the DomainController class. Initializes instances of InputController, KeyboardController, and PersistenceController.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating controllers.
      NotContainsKey - If a required key is not present in the data structures.

  • Method Details

    • createAlphabet

      public void createAlphabet(String key, char[] elem) throws ContainsKey, IOException, IncorrectType
      Creates an alphabet with the specified key and elements.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the alphabet.
      elem - The elements of the alphabet.
      Throws:
      ContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is used.
      IOException - If an error creating the Alphabet file.
      IncorrectType - If the input is not correct.

    • deleteAlphabet

      public void deleteAlphabet(String alphaKey) throws NotContainsKey, IOException, AlphabetUsed, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes an alphabet with the specified key.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The key associated with the alphabet to be deleted. Pre-conditions: - 'alphaKey' is not null. - Exists an Alphabet with 'alphaKey' Post-conditions: - If the alphabet with the specified key exists, it is deleted.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      FileNotDeleted - If an error deleting the Alphabet file.
      AlphabetUsed - If the Alphabet is Used for some Transition Matrix.

    • getAlphabet

      public Alphabet getAlphabet(String alphaKey) throws NotContainsKey
      Retrieves an Alphabet with the specified key from the associated InputController.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The key associated with the Alphabet.
      Returns:
      The Alphabet corresponding to the key, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.

    • listAlphabets

      public Alphabet[] listAlphabets()
      Retrieves an array of Alphabets from the associated InputController.
      Returns:
      An array of Alphabets, where each element represents an Alphabet in the InputController.

    • addElemAlphabet

      public void addElemAlphabet(String alphaKey, char elem) throws IncorrectAlphabetType, NotContainsKey, IOException
      Adds an element to the Alphabet with the specified key in the associated InputController.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The key associated with the Alphabet.
      elem - The element to add.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      IncorrectAlphabetType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.

    • delElemAlphabet

      public void delElemAlphabet(String alphaKey, char elem) throws IncorrectAlphabetType, NotContainsKey, IOException
      Deletes an element from the Alphabet with the specified key in the associated InputController.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The key associated with the Alphabet.
      elem - The element to delete.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      IncorrectAlphabetType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.

    • getCharactersFromFile

      public char[] getCharactersFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of characters from a file specified by the given path using the persistence controller.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to read.
      Returns:
      An array of characters extracted from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • createMatrixText

      public void createMatrixText(String alphaKey, String textKey, String text) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, StringNotInAlphabet, IncorrectType
      Creates a matrix text with the specified alphabet key, text key, and text.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The associated with alphabet.
      textKey - The key associated with the text.
      text - The text for creating the matrix.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      ContainsKey - If the specified key for Transition exist.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • createMatrixFrequencyList

      public void createMatrixFrequencyList(String alphaKey, String key, int[] frequenciesList, String[] wordsList) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, IncorrectType, StringNotInAlphabet
      Creates a matrix frequency list with the specified alphabet key, key, frequency list, and words list.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The associated with alphabet.
      key - The key associated with the matrix.
      frequenciesList - The list of frequencies.
      wordsList - The list of words.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key for the Alphabet is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      ContainsKey - If the specified key for Transition exist.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • deleteTransitionMatrix

      public void deleteTransitionMatrix(String keyTrans) throws NotContainsKey, IOException, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes a transition matrix with the specified key.
      Parameters:
      keyTrans - The key associated with the transition matrix to be deleted.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Transition file.
      FileNotDeleted - If an error deleting the Transition Matrix file.

    • getTransitionMatrix

      public TransitionMatrix getTransitionMatrix(String keyTrans) throws NotContainsKey
      Retrieves a TransitionMatrix with the specified key from the associated InputController.
      Parameters:
      keyTrans - The key associated with the TransitionMatrix.
      Returns:
      The TransitionMatrix corresponding to the key, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • listTransitionMatrix

      public TransitionMatrix[] listTransitionMatrix()
      Retrieves an array of TransitionMatrices from the associated InputController.
      Returns:
      An array of TransitionMatrices, where each element represents a TransitionMatrix in the InputController.

    • getTextFromFile

      public String getTextFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Reads the content of a text file specified by the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      The content of the text file as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getWordsFromFile

      public String[] getWordsFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of words from the specified text file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      An array of words extracted from the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getFrequenciesFromFile

      public int[] getFrequenciesFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of frequencies for each word in the specified text file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      An array of frequencies corresponding to each word in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • createKeyboard

      public void createKeyboard(String key, String transKey, String algorithm) throws IOException, NotContainsKey, IncorrectType, ContainsKey
      Creates a keyboard with the specified key, transition matrix, alphabet, and algorithm.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the new keyboard.
      transKey - The key associated with the transition matrix.
      algorithm - The algorithm to use for keyboard creation.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the keyboard.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not present in the data structures.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      ContainsKey - If the specified key is already present in the data structures.

    • listKeyboard

      public String[] listKeyboard()
      Retrieves the names of existing keyboards.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the names of existing keyboards.

    • getKeyboard

      public Keyboard getKeyboard(String key) throws NotContainsKey
      Retrieves the character distribution of a specified keyboard.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the keyboard.
      Returns:
      A two-dimensional array representing the character distribution of the keyboard.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • modifyKeyboard

      public void modifyKeyboard(String key, int i1, int j1, int i2, int j2) throws NotContainsKey, IOException
      Modifies the positions of characters on a specified keyboard.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the keyboard.
      i1 - The row index of the first position.
      j1 - The column index of the first position.
      i2 - The row index of the second position.
      j2 - The column index of the second position.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Keyboard file.

    • evaluateKeyboard

      public double evaluateKeyboard(String keyboardKey, String transKey) throws NotContainsKey
      Evaluates the efficiency of a keyboard using a specified transition matrix and alphabet.
      Parameters:
      keyboardKey - The key associated with the keyboard.
      transKey - The key associated with the transition matrix.
      Returns:
      A double representing the efficiency of the keyboard.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • deleteKeyboard

      public void deleteKeyboard(String key) throws IOException, NotContainsKey, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes a specified keyboard.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the keyboard to be deleted.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while deleting the keyboard.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not present in the data structures.
      FileNotDeleted - If the corresponding file is not deleted.
